com.Cardinal.CommandPackage.Handle.Properties

Class PropertiesHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Cardinal.CommandPackage.Handle.Properties.PropertiesHandler

  • public class PropertiesHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used for saving, loading, and accessing configurations for the bot and specific users and guilds.
    Author:
    Cardinal System

      • BOT_PERMISSIONS_PROPERTY

        public static final java.lang.String BOT_PERMISSIONS_PROPERTY
        This bot property key is connected to an array of Permissions that the bot requires to operate. This is used to generate an invite link for the bot. If your bot needs permissions to operate certain commands, look at ICommand.getPermissions().
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • bot_properties

        private static com.google.gson.JsonObject bot_properties

      • registerTypeAdapter

        public static void registerTypeAdapter(java.lang.reflect.Type type,
                                       java.lang.Object typeAdapter)
        Registers a type adapter for the Gson. This method only works before init(File) is invoked, which subsequently happens after CommandClient.CommandClientBuilder.build() is invoked.
        Parameters:
        type - type
        typeAdapter - typeAdapter
        See Also:
        GsonBuilder.registerTypeAdapter(Type, Object)

      • init

        public static void init(java.io.File workingDirectory)
        Sets up this handler's environment and loads all configurations. Leave innovation of this method to the CommandClient.
        Parameters:
        workingDirectory - the root directory of this program's workplace.

      • hasBotProperty

        public static boolean hasBotProperty(java.lang.String key)
        Used to determine whether the bot configuration has the given property present.
        Parameters:
        key - the property name.
        Returns:
        true : the bot config has the given property.
        false : the bot config does not have the given property.

      • setBotProperty

        public static void setBotProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                  java.lang.Object value,
                                  java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Sets the given bot property to the given value, using the given type parameter to parse the old value associated with this property (so it can passed to the PropertyChangeListeners).
        Parameters:
        key - the property name.
        value - the property value.
        type - the property type (When in doubt, use JsonObject).

      • removeBotProperty

        Parameters:

        type - the property type (When in doubt, use JsonObject).

      • removeChangeListener

        public static void removeChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
        Removes the given PropertyChangeListener to this properties handler.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener.

      • getChangeListeners

        public static java.util.List<PropertyChangeListener> getChangeListeners()
        Gets a list of this handler's PropertyChangeListeners.
        Returns:
        the listeners.
